Headline: Westbound #37 Sedgwick Temporary Reroute near Van Buren/Wacker
ShortDescription: Westbound 37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Wacker, Adams, and Clinton due to, a closed bridge.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Wacker, Adams, and Clinton due to, a closed bridge.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Reroute at 79th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 8A South Halsted buses temp rerouted NB 79th, Vincennes, 76th, Lafayette 79th, Perry SB 79th, Lafayette, 83rd, Halsted due to street blockage by 79th/Wentworth

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near due to street blockage near 79th/Wentworth.

Northbound buses will operate via 79th, Vincennes, 76th, Lafayette 79th, Perry.

Southbound buses will operate via 79th, Lafayette, 83rd, Halsted.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #24 Wentworth Temporary Reroute near 79th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 24 Wentworth buses temp. rerouted SB Vincennes 76th Lafayette 83rd Vincennes; NB Vincennes 83rd State 76th Vincennes due to street blockage by 79th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 79th/Wentworth, due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via Vincennes, 76th, Lafayette, 83rd, Vincennes.

Northbound  buses will operate via Vincennes, 83rd, State, 76th, Vincennes.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Reroute near 79th/State
ShortDescription: 29 State buses temp. rerouted SB: Lafayette, 76th, King Dr, 87th and Lafayette; NB: State, 87th, King Dr, 76th and State due to, street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
